channel.title: [PI] Random Disconnections for Players
channel.description: Sometimes my server used randomly kicks people out every 1-3 hours, and realised it was because of the EventManager I converted some events to CycleEventHandler, and wiped out the others completely Now my server disconnects players every 10-15 minutes, is there any reason for this? I can upload any classes you may need.

item.title: [PI] Random Disconnections for Players
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

Sometimes my server used randomly kicks people out every 1-3 hours, and realised it was because of the EventManager
I converted some events to CycleEventHandler, and wiped out the others completely
Now my server disconnects players every 10-15 minutes, is there any reason for this?
I can upload any classes you may need.

Read full topic
